title: GitTogether Hyderabad
description:
IMPORTANT: **Meetup RSVP is not considered as registration.** Please register at **[gittogethers.github.io](http://gittogethers.github.io/)** by **12 PM IST on 10th April**. Confirmed participants will receive an email by the end of the same day. Only confirmed participants will be granted entry to the venue, and we are unable to make any exceptions. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

Join us for this half-day meetup packed with insights, inspiration, and networking! Sharpen your tech skills and discover incredible open-source projects. What to expect:

* **Tech Sessions**: Dive into the latest open-source technologies with talks by experienced developers. Expand your knowledge and toolkit!
* **Community Spotlight**: Discover a hidden gem! One lucky participant gets to showcase a cool open-source project they've built. Could it be you?

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Agenda**

* 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM: **Registration and Networking**
* 10:00 AM to 10:10 AM: **git init (Welcome Note)**
* 10:10 AM to 10:40 AM: **Vector Database - The Future of Search by** [Prathap Chandra](Prathap%20Chandra)
* 10:40 AM to 11:10 AM: **Cybersecurity - API Security by** [Sai Ram](Sai%20Ram)
* 11:10 AM to 11:30 AM: **Break and Networking**
* 11:30 AM to 12:00 PM: **Community** **Spotlight (**[Submit for Spotlight](https://gh.io/spotlight)**)**
* 12:00 PM to 12:45 PM: **Product Management in AI Era: Transforming Strategies with Intelligent Solutions by** [Nadeemur Rehman Choudhary](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.linkedin.com/in/nadeemurchoudhary/&sa=D&source=calendar&usd=2&usg=AOvVaw1LVMhLA0Ar8wsdtiQzymDF)
* 12:45 PM to 1:00 PM: **git merge (Closing Note)**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Date**: Saturday 12th April, 2025

**Time**: 9:30 AM to 1:00 PM IST

**Venue**: TBD

For any queries, please contact [Tanmaiyee Vadloori](https://github.com/Tanmaiyee-Vadloori), Community Volunteer at GitTogether Hyderabad or write to us at meetups@github.com

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**GitTogethers Call for Sessions** üì¢

Are you someone who loves to share your knowledge? Do you have a passion for AI, Developer Experience, or Security?

We're calling for developers to submit their session proposals for upcoming GitTogether events! [Submit your proposal here](https://gh.io/cfs).

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Community Spotlight** üí°

Are you passionate about open-source development and have a project you'd love to share? We're looking for developers like you for spotlight at our upcoming GitTogethers. [Submit your projects here](https://gh.io/spotlight).

venue.name: EPAM India

title: GitTogether Bengaluru
description:
IMPORTANT: **Meetup RSVP is not considered as registration.** Please register at **[gittogethers.github.io](http://gittogethers.github.io/)** by **12 PM IST on 17th April**. Confirmed participants will receive an email by the end of the same day. Only confirmed participants will be granted entry to the venue, and we are unable to make any exceptions. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

Join us for this **hands-on workshop** packed with insights, inspiration, and networking! Sharpen your tech skills and discover incredible open-source projects.

This time, we're diving into hands-on coding with a special focus on leveraging GitHub Copilot as your code assistance tool. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned developer, this is your chance to explore innovative ways to enhance your development process.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Agenda**

* 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM: **Registration and Networking**
* 10:00 AM to 10:10 AM: **Welcome Note**
* 10:10 AM to 10:40 AM: **Intro to GitHub Copilot**
* 10:40 AM to 12:05 AM: **Hands-on** **Workshop**
* 12:05 AM to 12:30 PM: **Quiz, Networking and Event Closing**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Date**: Saturday 19th April 2025

**Time**: 9:30 AM to 12:30 PM IST

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**GitTogethers Call for Workshop Instructors** üì£
